pages.text: The Gary Peyton Strain$(br2)Base THC: 22% $(br)Base CBD: 3% $(br)Effect: Uplifted
Gary Peyton Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Gary Peyton Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Gary Peyton Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Gary Peyton Weed in an Extractor
You can package your gary peyton weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
